import React from 'react' const Orders = ({ items, order }) => { console.log(order) const {shipping_address} = order; return (
{ items.map(item =>
{item.name}

${item.price}

Qty: {item.qty}

) }
Order Total: {order.totalCost} | Address: {shipping_address.firstName}{shipping_address.lastName}
) } export default Orders
